title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Shared Learning Design to Promote Interprofessional Collaborative Learning in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with three or more healthcare professionals to analyze real clinical cases in a project-based setting.
Learners can identify and propose improvements for two or more interprofessional communication barriers using a structured discussion protocol.
Learners can describe their role changes in collaborative problem-solving processes in three or more stages through reflective journaling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
